definition: (of a tide) to ebb or go out
to retreat/to decline/to move back/to withdraw

sentences.english: When the tide ebbed, they scattered to pick sea shells.
sentences.chinese: 退潮之后，他们就四处去拾贝壳。

sentences.english: By this time the tide was beginning to ebb , and the ship was swinging round to her anchor.
sentences.chinese: 现在正是开始退潮的时刻，大船围着铁锚旋转。

sentences.english: When the tide is out,we can pick up some shells on the sand.
sentences.chinese: 退潮时我们可以在沙滩上捡贝壳。

sentences.english: I waded farther out as the tide ebbed.
sentences.chinese: 退潮时我涉水出去得更远。

sentences.english: The salvors must wait for low tide.
sentences.chinese: 抢救人员必须等待退潮。

sentences.english: Soldier Crabs feed on mudflats after the tide ebbs.
sentences.chinese: 退潮后，短指和尚蟹成群在泥滩上觅食。

sentences.english: When job ebbs with his groans fading into slumber.
sentences.chinese: 当工作退潮而去，他在酣甜中渐弱了他的呻吟。

sentences.english: Although the tide was going out, there were few slow rollers .
sentences.chinese: 虽然正是退潮时刻，但还是出现一些姗姗而来的巨浪。

sentences.english: For example, it's amazing to see the way a tidal pool changes with the tide.
sentences.chinese: 例如看着潮汐随着潮退潮涨而改变，真是奇妙无比的。

sentences.english: When the tide had ebbed away,the shells were left on the sand.
sentences.chinese: 退潮后沙滩上留下了许多贝壳。

sentences.english: The receding tide stranded the whale.
sentences.chinese: 退潮把鲸鱼搁浅在海滩上。

sentences.english: Guests are ferried to and from the hotel via "sea tractor" during low tide.
sentences.chinese: 在退潮时，客人通过海滩拖拉机进出酒店。

sentences.english: Because this is numerous concept also be in one round this refluent in by buy sky.
sentences.chinese: 因此众多概念股也在这一轮退潮中被沽空。

definition: (of a tide) to ebb or go out
mud and sand flow together (idiom)/good and bad mingle
(of water, prices etc) to rise and fall
